definition: medical insurance/abbr. for 醫療保險|医疗保险[yi1 liao2 bao3 xian3]
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)

sentences.chinese: 然後就是奧巴馬的醫保計劃。

sentences.english: Mr DeMint says that health care is Mr Obama’s Waterloo.
sentences.chinese: 德銘特還認爲醫保就是奧巴馬的“滑鐵盧”。

sentences.english: a financial train wreck between the deficit social security and medical care.
sentences.chinese: 就是社保和醫保赤字的爛攤子。

sentences.english: Seniors use the health care system more than anyone else.
sentences.chinese: 而年長者比其他人都要更多的使用醫保系統。

sentences.english: Social insurance, health insurance and pension insurance to pay for many years?
sentences.chinese: 社會保險，醫保和養老保險要交多少年？

sentences.english: Wofford was a deeply moral advocate of health-care reform and civil rights.
sentences.chinese: 沃福德在道義上極力提倡醫保改革和民權。

sentences.english: This week, doctors will start receiving these lower reimbursements from the Medicare program.
sentences.chinese: 本週，醫生們從醫保計劃中獲得的補償將降低。

sentences.english: A ward, Chang Li immediately began chasing the beam implementation of medical insurance card.
sentences.chinese: 一出病房，常麗馬上就開始追着梁守業要醫保卡。

sentences.english: This not only strengthens Medicare, it saves taxpayer dollars.
sentences.chinese: 這不僅能鞏固醫保，也能節約納稅人的資金。

sentences.english: Access to high-quality health care is a right of all people.
sentences.chinese: 享受高品質的醫保是人民的權利。

sentences.english: Part of compensation for cost overruns are often resolved through consultation.
sentences.chinese: 醫保對超支部分的補償往往通過協商來解決。

sentences.english: There is the long-term care dodge.
sentences.chinese: 長期醫保計劃是敷衍了事。

sentences.english: That’s the bright side of thenew health law.
sentences.chinese: 以上是新醫保法的亮點。

sentences.english: College students will all be covered in the urban residents' medical insurance system starting this year.
sentences.chinese: 大學生從今年起都將包括在城市居民的醫保體系中。

sentences.english: Also, the case of Medical Treatment and Health Care Network of Zhangqiu is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 並通過章丘醫保網的實際案理作了實現和測試研究。

sentences.english: Health-care costs, Gates says, are “eating the Defense Department alive.
sentences.chinese: 在蓋茨看來，醫保開支“正在將國防部活活喫掉”。

definition: to submit an expense account/to apply for reimbursement/to write off/to wipe out
to provide for the elderly (family members)/to enjoy a life in retirement
expenditures/expenses/CL:筆|笔[bi3], 項|项[xiang4]/to spend money/(coll.) to pay wages
to implement/to carry out/to put into practice
